modules.title: Introduction to Python Programming
modules.description: This module covers the fundamental concepts of Python, including data types, operators, and basic control flow.  You'll learn how to write, run, and debug simple Python programs.

lessons.title: Setting up your Python Environment
lessons.content: Installing Python, choosing an IDE (VS Code, PyCharm, etc.), running your first 'Hello, world!' program, understanding the command line interface.

lessons.title: Data Types and Variables
lessons.content: Understanding integers, floats, strings, booleans.  Variable assignment, naming conventions, and type conversion.

lessons.title: Operators and Expressions
lessons.content: Arithmetic operators, comparison operators, logical operators.  Order of operations and evaluating expressions.

lessons.title: Basic Input and Output
lessons.content: Using the `input()` function to get user input.  Using the `print()` function to display output.  Formatting output using f-strings.

lessons.title: Control Flow: Conditional Statements
lessons.content: `if`, `elif`, and `else` statements.  Nested conditional statements and boolean logic in conditionals.

modules.title: Data Structures and Control Flow II
modules.description: This module delves into Python's core data structures – lists, tuples, dictionaries – and expands on control flow with loops.  You'll learn to manipulate data efficiently and write more complex programs.

lessons.title: Lists and Tuples
lessons.content: Creating, accessing, and modifying lists.  Understanding the difference between lists and tuples.  List comprehensions.

lessons.title: Dictionaries
lessons.content: Creating, accessing, and modifying dictionaries.  Working with keys and values.  Iterating through dictionaries.

lessons.title: Control Flow: Loops
lessons.content: `for` loops and `while` loops.  Iterating through lists, tuples, and dictionaries.  `break` and `continue` statements.

lessons.title: Functions
lessons.content: Defining and calling functions.  Parameters and arguments.  Return values.  Scope and lifetime of variables.

lessons.title: Working with Files
lessons.content: Opening, reading, writing, and closing files.  Handling file exceptions.
